Text:
Change log:
*Added support for generating SteamID LumaEmu
*Fixed crash when LumaEmu or RevEmu were used to connect to GoldSrc server created through LumaServerPatcher
*Changed how a SteamID, if there is no valid taketa.
*Added missing DLC
*minor fixes
*Fixed a crash related to updating Steam
*Removed support for the parameter:-clientapp
*Fixed vulnerability in dll
*Fixed an infinite loop in the application of the patch on Steam.dll
*Fixed a bug due to which some of the game fails to run
*Fixed memory leak
*Reduced CPU usage
*New icon and minor graphical fixes
*Optimized source code installation
